summary: Completed testing of Help Center screenshot functionality. Core features working including embedded screenshots, screenshot badges, and article navigation. Minor modal interaction issue found.

ui_bugs.issue: Screenshot hover and click interaction blocked by overlay element
ui_bugs.details: Overlay div intercepting pointer events preventing screenshot modal from opening when clicked

passed_tests: Help Center page loads correctly after authentication
Help categories display properly (6 categories found)
Category navigation works (Getting Started, Forms & Surveys, etc.)
Article navigation works (Quick Start Guide, Account Setup, etc.)
Screenshot badges show correct counts ('2 screenshots', '1 screenshot')
2 screenshots found in Quick Start Guide article
Screenshot images display with proper paths (/help-images/dashboard-overview.png, /help-images/nav-sidebar.png)
Article content renders properly with screenshots embedded inline
Proper breadcrumb navigation (Getting Started â†’ Quick Start Guide)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix screenshot modal interaction - overlay element (div with 'absolute inset-0' class) is intercepting pointer events, preventing users from clicking screenshots to zoom in. Need to adjust z-index or pointer-events CSS for proper click handling.
